participants.description: 1st Grade Teacher at Paradise Valley Unified School District

messages.message:
hey I am just wondering, are you in marching band . . . it is so hard to remember who is in band, soo many people

christina

hey don't cry or anything like that, I realized that you were a trumpet player right after I first sent you a message
christina

Brian
i wasn't gonna cry i was only joking.
okay, that's good, I just needed to know for sure, cuz sometimes ya just never know . . . . ;O)

Brian
never imaged you dating the bitch

Eh, never would have imagined this match up myself, but it's funny how life works out... and this is the happiest I have been in a very, very long time.  Couldn't have asked for a better person to be with.
